short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A majestic dragon stands guard at the mouth of a vast, mysterious cave.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Its scales are dark and rugged, glimmering faintly under the soft light filtering through the cavern's opening. The dragon's immense wings, lined with deep crimson membranes, stretch outward, creating a sense of both power and grace. Its posture is both watchful and regal, as if commanding the entire cavern. The cave walls, jagged and ancient, loom high above, framing the dragon in an epic silhouette. In the distance, a lone figure stands on a narrow ledge, dwarfed by the dragonâ€™s size, facing the mighty beast with a mix of courage and awe. This image perfectly captures a moment of ancient mystery and timeless confrontation between man and myth.
